synopsis.text: On the cusp of adolescence, young Wataru finds his ordinary life turned upside down when his father leaves and his mother's health deteriorates, leaving her hospitalized. Seeking solace in the unknown, Wataru explores a local building rumored to be haunted, only to stumble upon a mysterious boy named Mitsuru. Mitsuru introduces Wataru to a hidden world of magic and wonder, where a legendary Goddess of Destiny is believed to grant wishes. Fueled by a desire to mend his fractured family, Wataru embarks on a daring adventure in this strange new realm, determined to gather five mystical jewels and meet the Goddess. Along the way, he forms bonds with new companions, learning courage and resilience as he navigates through a world filled with magic and danger. As Wataru's extraordinary journey unfolds, he discovers that the power to change his fate may lie within him all along.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
